titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

p.hi: I worked at the Swedish lectures until I was interrupted by Lilley. After lunch Ella and I called on M
Christmas, and on William's Mother. William himself was
with neuralgia. Later, Ella and Ernest went to a dance, and I settled to work on the Lectures, but not to much effect.
